mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PT ORDER BY CASE WHEN PT_CATEGORY = '기타' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, PT_CATEGORY
SELECT PT_NAME FROM PT WHERE PT_HIDDEN = 0
SELECT PT_IDX, PT_NAME FROM PT WHERE PT_HIDDEN = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE PT SET PT_NAME = #{pt_name}, PT_CATEGORY = #{pt_category}, PT_IMAGE = #{pt_image}, PT_CONTENT = #{pt_content} WHERE PT_IDX = #{pt_idx}
UPDATE PT SET PT_HIDDEN = CASE WHEN PT_HIDDEN = 0 THEN 1 WHEN PT_HIDDEN = 1 THEN 0 ELSE PT_HIDDEN END WHERE PT_IDX = #{pt_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PT VALUES( PT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{pt_name}, #{pt_category}, #{pt_image}, #{pt_content}, NULL, 0 )
